name: Warborn Marauders
author: guitarninja
background: The Warborn Marauders are a band of roving orc-like beings who scrap, fight and die for the glory of it. Their origin is still unknown, but they are spread across the galaxy in wide numbers. Marauders usually gather with a steady amount of goblins who act as the workers and some even pilot goblin mech creations.
lore:
In the far reaches of the galaxy, on a planet called Cragoria, exists a formidable race known as the Warborn Marauders. These marauders are a warlike and tenacious people, who have embraced their warrior spirit and mastered the art of combat. They are renowned for their fearsome raids and conquests, leaving a trail of destruction in their wake.

Long ago, the Warborn Marauders emerged on a desolate and unforgiving planet, a world of harsh landscapes and scarce resources. In their quest for survival, the Warborn learned to harness their natural strength and adaptability, becoming skilled scavengers and warriors.

In this harsh environment, they encountered remnants of advanced technology scattered across their planet. These remnants were the ruins of a long-lost civilization, abandoned in ages past. The Warborn saw potential in this scrap technology and, over time, learned to salvage, repair, and repurpose it to their advantage. They became masters of makeshift weapons, armor, and machinery, cobbling together formidable war machines from salvaged parts.

With their newfound technological prowess and relentless combat skills, the Warborn Marauders began to expand their influence beyond their homeworld. Driven by their warrior spirit, they embarked on interstellar conquests, raiding and pillaging other planets and civilizations that stood in their way.

Their ferocity and scrap technology made them a formidable force, and their reputation as marauders spread across the galaxy. Few dared to challenge the Warborn in open warfare, for their scrap-armored warriors and powerful war machines struck terror into the hearts of their enemies.

As the Warborn Marauders continued their relentless conquests, they formed tight-knit clans, each led by a battle-hardened warlord. These warlords, known for their tactical brilliance and indomitable spirit, were chosen through feats of strength and cunning, proving themselves worthy to lead the clans into battle.

The Warborn Marauders developed a code of honor, respecting strength, courage, and loyalty. They valued those who fought alongside them, whether they were born Warborn or earned their place among the clan through combat prowess and loyalty.

Despite their fearsome reputation, the Warborn Marauders were not without honor. In certain cases, they forged uneasy alliances with other races or civilizations, entering into mercenary contracts to bolster their resources and expand their dominion. However, when these alliances no longer served their interests, the Warborn had no qualms about turning on former allies to claim victory.

As the Warborn Marauders continue to conquer and raid across the galaxy, they remain a force to be reckoned with â€“ a people driven by their warrior spirit, bound by the strength of their clans, and wielding scrap technology that has become a symbol of their resilience and resourcefulness. Their legacy as feared marauders continues to echo across the cosmos, leaving the galaxy to wonder what worlds will fall next to the unstoppable might of the Warborn Marauders.

grand_warlord.name: Grand Warlord
grand_warlord.description: One of the strongest marauders to ever live and a dreadfully scary opponent in a fight.

warlord.name: Warlord
warlord.description: A powerful leader of a marauder warband.

warlord_bike.name: Warlord on Bike
warlord_bike.description: A powerful leader of a marauder warband mounted on a war bike.

shaman.name: Shaman
shaman.description: A strange orc with psychic powers.

shaman_bike.name: Shaman on Bike
shaman_bike.description: A strange orc with psychic powers on a war bike.

mechanic.name: Mechanic
mechanic.description: A marauder with a knack for scrapping and fixing things.

mechanic_bike.name: Mechanic on Bike
mechanic_bike.description: A marauder with a knack for scrapping and fixing things on a war bike.

heavy_juggernaut_mechanic.name: Mechanic in Heavy Juggernaut
heavy_juggernaut_mechanic.description: A souped up but ramshackle heavy combat walker piloted by an orc with a knack for scrapping and fixing things.

mad_doctor.name: Mad Doctor
mad_doctor.description: A marauder with a knack for fixing up the wounded.

mad_doctor_bike.name: Mad Doctor on Bike
mad_doctor_bike.description: A marauder with a knack for fixing up the wounded on a war bike.

goblin_leader.name: Goblin Leader
goblin_leader.description: A cunning goblin with a motivating presence.

goblin_tank_commander.name: Goblin Tank Commander
goblin_tank_commander.description: A custom goblin tank upgraded by a particularly crafty goblin.

goblin_bikes.name: Goblin Bikers
goblin_bikes.description: Only the best are selected to ride these fast moving death traps.

goblin_tank.name: Goblin Tanks
goblin_tank.description: A small tank squadron built and crewed by goblins.

goblin_mega_tank.name: Goblin Mega Tank
goblin_mega_tank.description: A huge tank built and crewed by goblins.

goblin_walker.name: Goblin Mechs
goblin_walker.description: A small mech group built and crewed by goblins.

goblin_divers.name: Goblin Divers
goblin_divers.description: Goblins with ramshackle jetacks prepared to strike fast and hard.

boss_mob.name: Brutes
boss_mob.description: A group of big marauders ready to cause maximum havoc.

looter_mob.name: Scavengers
looter_mob.description: A group of marauders obsessed with looting and upgrading shooting weapons. Can be equipped for various specialist roles.

storm_orcs.name: Jetpack Marauders
storm_orcs.description: A group of angry marauders equipped with jetpacks.

ultra_boss_mob.name: Gravite Brutes
ultra_boss_mob.description: A group of marauders bosses that are heavily armored and dangerous.

attack_beast_herd.name: Beast Herd
attack_beast_herd.description: A ravening horde of bouncing beasts with gnashing teeth.

biker_mob.name: Marauder Bikers
biker_mob.description: A group of angry marauders on bikes.

boss_bikers.name: Brute Bikers
boss_bikers.description: A group of bigger marauders mounted on bikes.

orc_minicopter.name: Warborn Scrapcopters
orc_minicopter.description: Miniature helicopters for quick and deadly air attacks piloted by marauders.

scavenged_artillery.name: Scavenged Artillery
scavenged_artillery.description: A battery of small artillery guns built with scavenged parts.

transport_truck.name: Transport Truck
transport_truck.description: A ramshackled truck held together only by sheer will.

battle_truck.name: Battle Rig
battle_truck.description: A grand battle rig build out of various parts taken from other wrecked vehicles.

transport_helicopter.name: Transport Helicopter
transport_helicopter.description: A ramshackled helicopter held together only by sheer will.

battle_tank.name: Warborn Battle Tank
battle_tank.description: A ramshackle battle tank held together by sheer will.

heavy_battle_tank.name: Warborn Heavy Battle Tank
heavy_battle_tank.description: A larger ramshackle tank with more powerful weapon options.

attack_quad.name: Attack Quads
attack_quad.description: A group of small vehicles built to swiftly deploy devastating firepower.

attack_buggy.name: Attack Buggy
attack_buggy.description: A multi-purpose buggy built out of various parts taken from other wrecked vehicles.

blitz_bomber.name: Blitz Bomber
blitz_bomber.description: A ramshackle plane equipped for heavy bombing runs.

blitz_fighter.name: Blitz Fighter
blitz_fighter.description: A ramshackle plane equipped for fire support.

orc_juggernaut.name: Warborn Juggernaut
orc_juggernaut.description: A heavily armed but ramshackle combat walker.

heavy_juggernaut.name: Heavy Juggernaut
heavy_juggernaut.description: A souped up but ramshackle heavy combat walker.

heavy_walker.name: Warborn Heavy Juggernaut
heavy_walker.description: A large walker with a multitude of weapons and transport capacity within its belly.

super_heavy_walker.name: Warborn Super Heavy Juggernaut
super_heavy_walker.description: A massive walker with a multitude of weapons and transport capacity within its belly.

colossal_attack_beast.name: Colossal Attack Beast
colossal_attack_beast.description: An enormous four legged beast of war.

speed_pole.name: Big Boss Pole
speed_pole.description: Friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" add +1" to their Movement characteristic.

tracks.name: Tracks
tracks.description: This unit may ignore difficult terrain and obstacles of height 2" or less when moving.

goblin_assistant.name: Goblin Assistant
goblin_assistant.description: Models in this unit gain +1 to their Repair rule for each model with this rule.

orc_idol.name: Warborn Idol
orc_idol.description: This model and friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" gain +1 Courage.

war_banner.name: War Banner
war_banner.description: This model's unit gains +1 AP on all Melee weapons.

shouty.name: Shouty
shouty.description: This model may use Goblin Tactics an additional time per turn

quick_thinker.name: Quick Thinker
quick_thinker.description: While this model is on the table you gain 1 additional Strategy Point per round.

relic_killer_claw.name: The Killer Claw
relic_killer_claw.description: Replace one model's Energy Powerweapon(X) with The Killer Claw(X).
relic_killer_claw.flavor: This Claw is the most killy claw you've ever seen.

speed_pole.name: Big Boss Banner
speed_pole.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with The Big Boss Banner.
speed_pole.flavor: Nearby marauders are filled with a zeal to charge forward and attack.

boom_cannon.name: The Blast Cannon
boom_cannon.description: Replace one model's Battle Cannon with The Blast Cannon.
boom_cannon.flavor: A very scary cannon for pure destruction.

teleport.name: Jump Teleport
teleport.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may move up to 12" ignoring all models and terrain. This must end outside of 12" of any enemy units.

strength.name: Mighty Strength
strength.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Strength until the end of the round.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 4 hits with AP(4).

here_we_go.name: Get Em
here_we_go.description: Use when a unit declares a _Charge_ action. That unit gets +3" of Movement for that action.

final_stand.name: Final Stand
final_stand.description: Use when a unit is destroyed. If it didn't activate this round, it may take a free _Fight_ or _Shoot_ action before it is removed from the game.
final_stand.flavor: With their dying breath, the warborn lash out at their foes in revenge.

goblin_shield.name: Goblin Shield
goblin_shield.description: Use after a unit has been targeted by a Shooting attack. For this attack, roll a D10 each time an attack made with a ranged weapon hits that unit if there is a friendly _Goblin_ unit within 6" of it. On an 8 or less a hit is transferred to the _Goblin_ unit instead of the original target.
